title: NEOScavenger 0.9952b
description:
*Preface*

Sorry about the long wait guys, I've been crazy busy lately but I finally have some free time to upload this. It's a huge jump from the last version I uploaded as such I don't have a definite changelog from the previous version. However if you are curious as to what changed I encourage you to check out the developers blog here : http://bluebottlegames.com/main/

Also I changed the format from last time. As I originally packaged the game in a zip file I realized that 7zip would be the most efficient. I realize that not everyone has 7zip so I created a self-extracting executable which will unpackage the game files for you. It is created with 7zip and has not been modified in anyway. I hope you all enjoy and if you have any questions throw a comment and I'll try to get back you.

Thanks,

-AppRipper

*End Preface*
 
 
NEO Scavenger
(c) Blue Bottle Games

Release date: 9/10/2014 
Protection: DRM-Free
Language: English
Version: 0.9952b


NEO Scavenger is a turn-based, rogue-like RPG where you must
survive in the wasteland long enough to figure out who you are
Each turn you must decide where to go, how to scavenge for
supplies, and how to deal with anything and anyone you encounter
And with each passing minute, the pit in your stomach grows, your
dehydration worsens, your muscles tire, and your body temperature
drops in the cold autumn air. Choose your starting abilities
carefully, because they and your wit are the only tools you have in
the apocalypse!
             <a href="
http://bluebottlegames.com/main/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://bluebottlegames.com/main/</a>

Instructions:
1) Unzip (with executable)
2) Enjoy!

It's DRM-Free as far as I know, however I would block it on your firewall anyway.

Hope you all enjoy this game! Buy it and support the developer! He really deserves it!

-AppRipper "Happy Hacking!"

*** CHANGELOG ****

None this time guys, Sorry! (check preface)
